title: Deep Learning Framework with GPU Acceleration
sub-title: Deeplex is a PyTorch inspired, basic Deep Learning Framework; built on top of an Reverse-Mode AutoGrad Engine.

title: GridGuid Sudoku Detector & Solver
sub-title: An Android Flutter Application, for automatically detect/recognize any sudoku board configuration and lets user play it in the mobile.

title: Human-Background Segmentation
sub-title: The process is segmenting a person(or persons) in an image from its background. Here we use the concept of semantic segmentation to predict the label of every pixel (dense prediction) in an image.

title: Content Based Movie Recommendation System
sub-title: Movie recommendation system using Content Based approach, i used cosine similarity to calibrate the similarity index.

title: Coding Classical Computer Vision Algorithms From Scratch in Python
sub-title: Canny Edge Detection, Affine Transformations, Guassian Filter, Histogram Equalization, Perspective Transformations, Thresholding, etc..
